nodes.text: Harra was a Hutt crime lady who operated on the swampy planet of Vodran, in Hutt Space. She made her fortune buying, selling and trading exotic creatures, including rancors, for other Hutts around the galaxy. After the Galactic Empire raided her domain, Harra and her henchmen abandoned Vodran, and her stronghold was reduced to rubble by Imperial forces. Her animals, however, remained on Vodran and returned to the wild.
